MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 07-DEC-2020 16:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the EH4 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Parkgrove Drive and surrounding areas. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11:55am due to an underground cable fault near the Parkgrove Loan substation and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:08pm on Monday, 07 December 2020
